mapper.select: select DISTINCT m.*, sqs.total_quantity_shipped, sm.quantity_shipped, om.label_option, snm.quantity_notice from shipment_notice sn inner join shipment s on s.shipment_notice_id = sn.id inner join shipment_merchandise sm on sm.shipment_id = s.id inner join merchandise m on m.id = sm.merchandise_id inner join ( select sm2.merchandise_id, sum(sm2.quantity_shipped) total_quantity_shipped from shipment_notice sn2 inner join shipment s2 on s2.shipment_notice_id = sn2.id inner join shipment_merchandise sm2 on sm2.shipment_id = s2.id where sm2.is_delete = 0 group by sm2.merchandise_id ) sqs on sqs.merchandise_id = m.id inner join shipment_notice_merchandise snm on snm.merchandise_id = m.id and snm.shipment_notice_id = sn.id inner join order_merchandise om on om.merchandise_id = m.id and om.order_id = sn.order_id where sn.id = #{shipmentNoticeId} and s.id = #{id} and sn.is_delete = 0
select s.*, sn.tag from shipment s inner join shipment_notice sn on sn.id = s.shipment_notice_id where s.id = #{id} and s.is_delete = 0
